Bagé, January 28, 1842. Most Excellent Sir General João Antônio

This is to inform Your Excellency José Mariano de Matos, so that Your Excellency, Sir José Mariano, wishes it so, and it would be good that he does not compel me to a more terrible contingency. In the circumstances in which I find myself, only the consideration and friendship of my compatriots can soften the bitterness of my situation.

Believe Your Excellency
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

To Citizen General João Antônio da Silveira. Wherever he may be. From his friend and compatriot Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre.

Answered on March 7, 1842.
